entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] CI failure X64Avx_NoAvx2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 - linux x64 Native AOT #90775
    8.0.0
  • Ensure localization changes are ported to release/8.0 #90755
    8.0.0
  • AOT Crash on iOS Release build, net8p7 #90751
    8.0.0
  • Trimmed InlineArrayAttribute breaks Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #90745
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Modify static abstract interfaces for functions #90744
  • Rounding error in SqlMoney.ToInt64 #90741
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method #90732
  • Arbitrary UnhandledException Behaviour #90728
  • Math.Pow behavior deviates from documentation #90725
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #90723
    9.0.0
  • `UnreachableBlocksOptimizer.GetConstantValue` should used boxed integers instead of boxing every time #90718
  • `UnrechableBlocksOptimizer` has bad performance #90717
  • GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8013200B BEGIN: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b END: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b #90715
  • Test failure JIT\\superpmi\\superpmicollect\\superpmicollect.cmd #90711
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ComInterfaceGenerator and LibraryImportGenerator tests fail on linux-arm with "symbol lookup error: /root/helix/work/workitem/e/Microsoft.Interop.Tests.NativeExportsNE.so: undefined symbol: __atomic_compare_exchange_4" #90376
    8.0.0
  • Port System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88566
    8.0.0
  • How should I debug the corehost .sln？ #89354
  • dotnet is not able to run programs compiled with csc #90080
  • Performance Regression with .NET 8 Preview 6 #90101
    8.0.0
  • build-rootfs.sh doesn't work on WSL - add to docs #77348
  • Updating .NET Linux Build for .NET 8 #83428
  • dotnet restore hangs sometimes #80230
  • Improve XunitWrapper test runner #77410
  • Incorrect matching with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #78609
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT broken on `main` #90742
  • [wasm] WBT for wasi broken on `main` #90743
  • Custom Marshallers never use stateful GetPinnableReference on struct #90621
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Linq documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88589
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: serialize dictionary with JsonExtensionData ignores DefaultIgnoreCondition option #90670
  • Failure in Mono run of System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #89661
  • Generated docs xml files do not contain the newest APIs #90738
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #90602
    8.0.0
  • The AOT compiler doesn't support a MONO_PATH with a colon #90422
    8.0.0
  • NetworkStream.ReadAsync runs slower on ubuntu than on windows #90664
    9.0.0
  • AOT: Delegate.CreateDelegate throws attempting to JIT compile method #90660
  • NET8 breaking change due to TypeForwardedTo attribute missing for PEFileKinds #90578
    8.0.0
  • Race condition in building ILLink props #90702
  • Hot Reload Fails on Microsoft Subsystem for Android & Android Emulators for .razor pages #84572
    8.0.0
  • Forking of CoreCLR process #8919
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Slightly reduce the Depth3Test that often times out on Linux #90777
    test-failure, os-linux, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Make chrome version bumps for testing explicit, instead of automatic updates to latest #90772
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • experiment #90769
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add note about IlcScanReflection to the native aot docs #90765
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Update 6.0 branch to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [main] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90756
    needs-area-label
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #90750
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90749
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one only if exists #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid PGO optimization path on Nuget cache containing spaces. #90729
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] new synchronization mechnism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve linker performance by avoiding IndexOf #90721
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix win-arm64 native varargs ABI #90712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update 6.0 staging branch with Ubuntu 22.04 queue for Perf runs #90763
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update 7.0 staging to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90768
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90709
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Revert changes to HasNativeCodeReJitAware #90696
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90746
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90760
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/8.0] [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90758
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90754
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90759
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Expose TC_CallCountThreshold and TC_CallCountingDelayMs as runtime knobs #90761
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve profiled casts #2 #90735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add check for tizen in ilc and crossgen2 #90310
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete support for IA64 relocs #90752
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make some methods public that we need to call. #90689
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove quotes from language versions in source gen diagnostics. #90720
    area-Meta
  • Revert "Temporarily increase timeouts for perf jobs, because of limit… #90757
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin sdk version to 8.0.100-rc.1.23415.5 for workload testing #90748
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expose TC_CallCountThreshold and TC_CallCountingDelayMs as runtime knobs #90724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90739
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90652
    area-Host
  • Add collections with all marshaller methods on the marshallers #90706
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Pin sdk version to 8.0.100-rc.1.23415.5 for workload testing #90747
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90722
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90668
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix Shuffling Thunks part 2 #90707
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT][ios] Clean up building HelloiOS sample #90730
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors after #90318. #90713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90659
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90695
    needs-area-label
  • Add missing type forwards #90669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90287
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • proof of concept #90058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid looking for dynamically accessed members when none are requested. #90154
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • test #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
